title: INDIA Opposition bloc to contest Lok Sabha elections together 'as far as possible'
selftext:
The INDIA Opposition bloc also passed a resolution to initiate a seat-sharing arrangement at the earliest in its Mumbai meet. The alliance has chosen 'Judega Bharat, Jeetega India' (Bharat Will Unite, India Will Win) as their theme.
